title: When Super-Husband Isn't Enough
itunes:author: Guests: Matt & Lisa Jacobson
itunes:summary:
While doing things to help your spouse is wonderful, activities should never replace the joy of being together. Greg, Erin and John discuss how they've learned the importance of spending time with their spouses. Featuring Matt and Lisa Jacobson.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get our "100 Ways to Love" book bundle for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-07-01?refcd=1132501

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/when-super-husband-isnt-enough/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
